T02D2694:1b-1: a'arya mu kha sha da dha ra by'a khya ta /
T02D2694:1b-3: 'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa /
T02D2694:1b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag [dd] 'tshal lo //
T02D2694:1b-5: gzungs 'di ni don drug la brtsams nas gsungs par mngon te /
T02D2694:1b-6: shes rab yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2694:1b-7: snying rje'i stobs rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2694:1b-8: rang gi rgyud rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2694:1b-9: gzhan gyis bsgrubs pa'i gegs yongs su shes pa dang /
T02D2694:1b-10: byang chub kyi tshogs kun tu sdud pa dang de'i
T02D2694:1b-11: 'bras bu yang dag pa'i ye shes dang de bzhin
T02D2694:1b-12: nyid do // rnam grangs gzhan yang sdug bsngal ba'i dus dang /
T02D2694:1b-13: bde ba'i dus na sems can gyi khams 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2694:1b-14: bdag dang gzhan las tshogs kyi bar chad yongs su spong ba dang /
T02D2694:1b-15: tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad sogs pa dang /
T02D2694:1b-16: tshogs bsags pa yang rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2694:1b-17: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa las brtsams nas bstan to //
T02D2694:1b-18: rnam grangs gzhan du'ang rtogs te /
T02D2694:2a-0: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ldog pa'i rgyu ni drug @2a * //
T02D2694:2a-2: sems can la mi phyogs shing 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la ji snyam pa med pa dang /
T02D2694:2a-3: 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dag la kun du 'dzin pa'i sems nyid dang /
T02D2694:2a-4: nyon mongs pa dang las kyi sgrib pa sogs pa dang /
T02D2694:2a-5: mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su bskyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /
T02D2694:2a-6: tshogs ma bsags pa nyid dang /
T02D2694:2a-7: srid pa'i phun sum tshogs pa la gzhol ba'i sems zang zing dang bcas pa nyid de /
T02D2694:2a-8: de'i gnyen por go rims bzhin du sgo drug po dag rig par bya'o //
T02D2694:2a-9: dang po dang gnyis pas ni sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba'i gnas skabs na /
T02D2694:2a-10: sems can yongs su mi gtong bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bstan to //
T02D2694:2a-11: lnga pas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par byed do //
T02D2694:2a-12: gsum pa dang bzhi pas ni gegs sel bas bdag nyid kyis bsgrub par nus pa nyid do //
T02D2694:2a-14: rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong ma yin pa'i 'bras
T02D2694:2a-15: bu chos kyi sku zhes bya ba phul du dbyung
T02D2694:2a-17: sems can thams cad kyi don bya bar nye bar
T02D2694:2a-18: gnas pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa yin
T02D2694:2a-20: rnam pa gcig tu na rnam grangs gzhan yang bsam
T02D2694:2b-0: pa @2b yongs su dag pa rnam pa bzhis yongs
T02D2694:2b-1: su bstan te / chos la bdag med par rab tu rtogs pas /
T02D2694:2b-2: sems can log par zhugs pa rnams dang /
T02D2694:2b-3: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis mi g-yos pa nyid dang /
T02D2694:2b-4: phun sum tshogs pa'i dus na sems can la blta
T02D2694:2b-5: ba dang bcas pa la kun du rmongs pa mi
T02D2694:2b-6: 'byung ba dang / ma dag pa'i rgyu gnas ngan
T02D2694:2b-7: len gyi 'bras bu bskyed pa'i mthu dang mi mthun
T02D2694:2b-9: de yongs su brtas par byed pa'i rgyu yongs su spong bas so //
T02D2694:2b-10: sbyor ba rnam par dag pa ni pha rol tu
T02D2694:2b-11: phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la
T02D2694:2b-13: bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu ni bla na med pa'i ye shes so /
T02D2694:2b-15: // / sbyor ba rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu ni /
T02D2694:2b-16: rnam par grol ba ste gnas gyur pa'o //
T02D2694:2b-17: bla na med pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D2694:2b-18: rnam par grol ba ni sbyor ba rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu yin te /
T02D2694:2b-19: pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i
T02D2694:2b-20: rtsa ba 'jig rten pa'am 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang
T02D2694:2b-21: rung gang ci yod pa de bla na med pa'i
T02D2694:2b-22: ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig ces bya ba
T02D2694:2b-23: la sogs pa gsung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2694:2b-24: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs na /
T02D2694:2b-25: bsam pa 'ba' zhig gis bla na med pa'i ye shes bskyed mi nus pa'i phyir te /
T02D2694:2b-26: pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bur bshad de /
T02D2694:2b-27: rigs mthun pa'i phyir bla na med pa'i ye shes
T02D2694:2b-28: nyid bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bur rigs
T02D2694:2b-29: so // de gnyis ka'i 'bras bu ni gnyis ka
T02D2694:2b-30: ste bsam pa dang sbyor ba gcig la gcig ltos
T02D2694:2b-31: pa gnyis shin tu mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2694:2b-32: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rnam par yongs su
T02D2694:2b-33: bsgoms pas yongs su bsngos pa'i dbang gis thams cad
T02D2694:2b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan rnams kyang 'thob ste rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2694:2b-36: de lta ma yin na ni bsam pa yongs su
T02D2694:2b-37: sbyangs pa 'bras bu med pa kho nar 'gyur ro
T02D2694:2b-38: // de gnyis ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa yin no //
T02D2694:2b-39: rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyang shes rab dang snying rje mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su zin pa ste /
T02D2694:2b-40: rnam pa de nyid kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2694:3a-0: yon tan de lta bu thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' @3a * //
T02D2694:3a-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D2694:3a-2: de lta bas na 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2694:3a-3: de ltar rnam pa drug po bdag gis bsgoms pa
T02D2694:3a-4: de dag gi phan yon rnam pa drug khong du
T02D2694:3a-5: chud par bya ste go rims bzhin no //
T02D2694:3a-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub
T02D2694:3a-7: sems dpa' ni 'khor bar 'khor ba na sdug bsngal
T02D2694:3a-8: srab mor myong bar 'gyur te des yongs su gtugs
T02D2694:3a-10: zad mi shes pa dang rgya che ba'i rgyun gyis
T02D2694:3a-11: 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur
T02D2694:3a-12: zhing sems can gyi khams tshad med pa yongs su
T02D2694:3a-14: sgrib pa med par dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams myur
T02D2694:3a-15: du yang dag par sdud par byed la dge ba
T02D2694:3a-16: la kun du dga' zhing dge ba la mos pa
T02D2694:3a-17: dang / byang chub sems dpa' la 'khrul ba shin
T02D2694:3a-18: tu phra ba yang mi snang zhing rab tu rtogs
T02D2694:3a-20: myur du tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed cing thams
T02D2694:3a-21: cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge
T02D2694:3a-23: 'jig rten ji tsam pa dang sems can ji snyed
T02D2694:3a-24: de tsam du sems can thams cad kyi don byed
T02D2694:3a-25: par snang ste de yang bsgrub bo //
T02D2694:3a-26: 'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa /
